channel.title: New Credits Rule for Server Downloads?
channel.description:
Idk if its just me but its annoying when people do this:
I MAKE DA SERVER CUSTOM MENG... I TAKE DIS SOURCE AND ADD 1 COMMAND CREDIT: 99% ME FOR DA 1 COMMAND 1% FOR ___ CBA SAYING NAME CUZ I IZ COOL FOR SOURCE BASE.
What do i propose? This format is used:
[NAME] - added command - added ____ - added ____ [NAME] - added ____ - tutorial ____ - dfgjto; [NAME] - ______ etc. you get the point :P
[size=36pt]NO MORE %PERCENTAGE%[/size] Do you agree with me? Leave feedback Do you disagree with me? Leave feedback When i say feedback i do not mean:
U SAK DEK MENG
NOOOOB
What i do mean is:
I agree because this does frustrate me and its unfair on those who worked hard on it getting a small % because a leech/troll decides he gets the right to determine who gets what %
I disagree because i iz stubid meng
[size=18pt]ALSO[/size] Not trying to be mean but this is an example of rubbish: [quote="Football1smylife, post:1, topic:377783"][b]Credits[/b] Sanity Whoever else thinks they should get credit[/quote] Great job giving credits TO THE WORLD I IZ GIVING DA WORLD CREDIT FOR EXISTENCE HEHE

item.title: New Credits Rule for Server Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:23, topic:440133”][quote author=Newty link=topic=542814.msg3978371#msg3978371 date=1334943733]
I’m locking this thread.

Credits: newty 74%
Mitb 41% he gave me mad modz skills
silabsoft 2% she made me the sandwich that gave me the strength to lock dis
Lin 19% he’s mad cool
[/quote]

edit: 1% to david for actually locking the thread since I was on my phone[/quote]

what your phone can’t lock topics because of lag?

use my server restarter.

Read full topic

Sweet baby jesus

We’re not gunna stop people from messing with their stupid credits, just let them have it… it’s not that big of a deal.

Credits

90% Me
10% Google

item.description:

item.title: New Credits Rule for Server Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Name some, because if you are talking about super, hes not. Ryley, hes not.

name any regular on the moparisthebest side. there’s also a few on this side:

s1gma aka s
(Anthony)
Sinisoul as much as i regret saying it.
dain bramage
zyle1992
Lin
Taharok
Evil
Native^ i suppose
Davidi2 i suppose
… etc

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:10, topic:440133”]I already do credits like this on any project that I do, as I feel it shows more respect than to belittle some with low percentages and such. As well as, proper percentages can never truly be given.

@tillly - For a quick answer, Mopman, Miss Silabsoft, Moparisthebest all have college degree’s for programming languages. This is just what I know of off hand while I eat my burrito so yea :P[/quote]
quite a bit of moparisthebest people/old timers including myself hold/are in the process of earning degrees in computer science or something similar/equivalent. i don’t believe silabsoft does, however.

Read full topic

item.title: New Credits Rule for Server Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @wize_wizerd5 wize wizerd5
item.description:
@wize_wizerd5 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:13, topic:440133”][quote author=wize wizerd5 link=topic=542814.msg3978342#msg3978342 date=1334940837]

I already do credits like this on any project that I do, as I feel it shows more respect than to belittle some with low percentages and such. As well as, proper percentages can never truly be given.

^^ this is what im trying to say

However apparently the majority of the mopar members that have replied so far are just going to spam irrelevant junk.

@RiiPiiNFtW - your comment was not needed as its irrelevant and rude.

BACK TO THE POINT: Credits should be taken seriously as its what you do out of respect. I know this is just a game but in reality credits is a very serious matter.
[/quote]
It was rune and it was relevant. Facts and sometimes be are to take in, its the truth though so deal with it.[/quote]

Im sorry but this topic is about people giving credits in a respectful manner. Not about :

RiiPiiNFtW:

Mopar has more experienced programmers then R-S and RL combined. R-S kids are fat arrogant idiots and RL kids are just stupid and Mopar Outcasts.

Please leave. This is not a thread for flame wars and its not a place to get post count up.

EDIT: Also off topic. Point is this forums is for everyone. People who wish to learn, people who wish to teach and people who wish to show off their fantastic work.

ALSO: The manner in which you speak shows that you are a hypocrite. Only a child would use that language in this context.

Read full topic

http://rootzwiki.com/topic/21913-miuius-presents-miui-ics-230-for-mesmerize-showcase-updated-33112/
http://rootzwiki.com/topic/13774-rom-sbrissens-ics-build-edited-for-mesmerize-showcase-build-65/

XDA Developers

[ROM] Revolver 4 by Gnufabio | 4.2.1 - IC421(G) | Sep 5 | TF101-TF101G-SL101 |...

Features Fast AS HELL Deodexed Speed up & optimizations Lot of plugins in Revolver Parts (not now, in the future) Face unlock Advanced power dialog FAQs W…

item.description:
@wize_wizerd5 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:6, topic:440133”][quote author=wize wizerd5 link=topic=542814.msg3978331#msg3978331 date=1334939392]

as if the majority of projects should be taken that seriously

All projects should be taken seriously as they put their work into it.
[/quote]
most of the time it’s poor quality work :P[/quote]

That may be true. But if you want to get rid of that you will end up with a forum community of a hand full that are excellent programmers. Mopar obviously isn’t

Back to the point. Credits should be given in a fair manner and not some random derp percentages.
